LanguageData.PJ_BarkMandoArmor.label: Barky's clan armor
LanguageData.PJ_BarkMandoArmor.description: Armor dedicated to the followers of an honored warrior. Mandalorians wear this sigil-bound vestment and cry out, For Barkyyyyyy!!!
LanguageData.PJ_MandoArmor.label: Mando armor
LanguageData.PJ_MandoArmor.description: The most recognizable symbol of the Mandalorian culture, Mandalorian armor was a catch-all term for the sets of distinctive full-body armor worn by Mandalorian warriors and soldiers throughout galactic history.
LanguageData.PJ_MandoHelm.label: Mando helm
LanguageData.PJ_MandoHelm.description: The ever-recognizable T-shaped visor of the mandalorian helmet strikes fear throughout the galaxy.
LanguageData.PJ_VetMandoArmor.label: Mando Veteran armor
LanguageData.PJ_VetMandoArmor.description: The most recognizable symbol of the Mandalorian culture, Mandalorian armor was a catch-all term for the sets of distinctive full-body armor worn by Mandalorian warriors and soldiers throughout galactic history.
